{{Use dmy dates|date=June 2011}} {{Use Australian English|date=June 2011}} {{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC Western Plains| |callsign = 2WPR| |coordinates = {{Coord|32|14|58.33|S|148|36|07.15|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 17 May 1993 | |frequency = '''95.9''' [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Dubbo
'''107.1''' [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Central Western Slopes
'''657''' [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Far West
'''1584''' [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Far West| |area = [[Far West (New South Wales)|Western Plains]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/westernplains/ http://www.abc.net.au/westernplains/] | }} '''ABC Western Plains''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Dubbo]], [[New South Wales]]. The broadcast region stretches from Wellington north to Goodooga and west from Coonabarabran to Wilcannia. The station covers the top half of the [[Far West (New South Wales)|Far West]] region and part of the [[Orana (New South Wales)|Orana]] region of [[New South Wales]]. This includes Dubbo City and the towns of [[Bourke, New South Wales|Bourke]], [[Cobar, New South Wales|Cobar]], [[Nyngan, New South Wales|Nyngan]], [[Walgett, New South Wales|Walgett]], [[Mudgee]], [[Lightning Ridge, New South Wales|Lightning Ridge]], [[Gilgandra, New South Wales|Gilgandra]], [[Coonamble, New South Wales|Coonamble]] and [[Warren, New South Wales|Warren]] The station also provides services to isolated communities via satellite such as Ivanhoe, Menindee, Talbingo, Khancoban and even Norfolk Island. ABC Western Plains began operating in [[1993]] taking over the western and [[outback]] region previously covered from [[Orange, New South Wales|Orange]] by [[ABC Central West]]. In 2008 the station gained full regional status and is now self managed. This saw the establishment of a local morning show. The station is heard on these main [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] and [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] frequencies along with a number of low-power FM repeaters: *'''2WPR''' 95.9 and 107.1 FM *'''2BY''' 657 AM *'''2WA''' 1584 AM ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with Andrew Dunkley â 6:00 AM to 7:45 AM, including Rural News with Aimee Volkofsky at 6:40 AM and local news with Carolyn Garner at 6:30 and 7:30 AM *Mornings with Dugald Saunders - 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with ABC Central West & Western Plains â 6:00 AM to 7:45 AM and 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[702 ABC Sydney]] and [[ABC Central West]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=History of ABC Western Plains |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/02/19/2166678.htm |date=2003-02-19 |accessdate=2008-06-04 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Western Plains}} [[Category:Radio stations in New South Wales]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1993]]
